Text: Baird Bryant:  He is best known as the cameraman on the Albert Maysles film "Gimme Shelter" who filmed the fatal stabbing of Rolling Stones concertgoer Meredith Hunter by Hells Angel Alan Passaro at the Altamont Free Concert in December 1969.
